verses.verse: O <WG5599> foolish <WG453> Galatians <WG1052>, who <WG5101> did bewitch <WG940> you <WG5209>, before <WG2596> whose <WG3739> eyes <WG3788> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> was openly set forth <WG4270> crucified <WG4717>?

This <WG5124> only <WG3440> would <WG2309> I learn <WG3129> from <WG575> you <WG5216>. Received ye <WG2983> the Spirit <WG4151> by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the law <WG3551>, or <WG2228> by <WG1537> the hearing <WG189> of faith <WG4102>?
Are ye <WG2075> so <WG3779> foolish <WG453>? having begun <WG1728> in the Spirit <WG4151>, are ye <WG2005> now <WG3568> perfected <WG2005> in the flesh <WG4561>?
Did ye suffer <WG3958> so many things <WG5118> in vain <WG1500>? if <WG1489> it be indeed <WG2532> in vain <WG1500>.

He <WG2023> therefore <WG3767> that <WG3588> supplieth <WG2023> to you <WG5213> the Spirit <WG4151>, and <WG2532> worketh <WG1754> miracles <WG1411> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, doeth he it by <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the law <WG3551>, or <WG2228> by <WG1537> the hearing <WG189> of faith <WG4102>?
Even as <WG2531> Abraham <WG11> believed <WG4100> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> it was reckoned <WG3049> unto him <WG846> for <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343>.
Know therefore <WG686> that <WG3754> they that <WG3754> are <WG3588> of <WG1537> faith <WG4102>, the same <WG3778> are <WG1526> sons of <WG5207> Abraham <WG1097>.

And <WG1161> the scripture <WG1124>, foreseeing <WG4275> that <WG3754> God <WG2316> would justify <WG1344> the Gentiles <WG1484> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102>, preached the gospel <WG4283> beforehand unto Abraham <WG11>, saying <WG3754>, In <WG1722> thee <WG4671> shall <WG2127> all <WG3956> the nations <WG1484> be blessed <WG2127>.
So then <WG5620> they <WG2127> that are <WG3588> of <WG1537> faith <WG4102> are blessed <WG2127> with <WG4862> the faithful <WG4103> Abraham <WG11>.

For <WG1063> as many as <WG3745> are <WG1526> of <WG1537> the works <WG2041> of the law <WG3551> are <WG1526> under <WG5259> a curse <WG2671>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, Cursed <WG1944> is every one <WG3956> who <WG3588> continueth <WG1696> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956> that <WG3739> are written <WG1125> in <WG1722> the book <WG975> of the law <WG3551>, to do <WG4160> them <WG846>.

Now <WG1161> that <WG3754> no man <WG3762> is justified <WG1344> by <WG1722> the law <WG3551> before <WG3844> God <WG2316>, is evident <WG1212>: for <WG3754>, The righteous <WG1342> shall live <WG2198> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102>;
and <WG1161> the law <WG3551> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> faith <WG4102>; but <WG235>, He <WG444> that doeth <WG4160> them <WG846> shall live <WG2198> in <WG1722> them <WG846>.

Christ <WG5547> redeemed <WG1805> us <WG2248> from <WG1537> the curse <WG2671> of the law <WG3551>, having become <WG1096> a curse <WG2671> for <WG5228> us <WG2257>; for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, Cursed <WG1944> is every one <WG3956> that <WG3588> hangeth <WG2910> on <WG1909> a tree <WG3586>:

that <WG2443> upon <WG1519> the Gentiles <WG1484> might come <WG1096> the blessing <WG2129> of Abraham <WG11> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>; that <WG2443> we might receive <WG2983> the promise <WG1860> of the Spirit <WG4151> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102>.

Brethren <WG80>, I speak <WG3004> after the manner of <WG2596> men <WG444>: Though <WG3676> it be but <WG3676> a man <WG444>'s covenant <WG1242>, yet when it hath been confirmed <WG2964>, no one <WG3762> maketh it void <WG114>, or <WG2228> addeth thereto <WG1928>.

Now <WG1161> to Abraham <WG11> were <WG4483> the promises <WG1860> spoken <WG4483>, and <WG2532> to his <WG846> seed <WG4690>. He saith <WG3004> not <WG3756>, And <WG2532> to seeds <WG4690>, as <WG5613> of <WG1909> many <WG4183>; but <WG235> as <WG5613> of <WG1909> one <WG1520>, And <WG2532> to <WG4690> thy <WG4675> seed <WG4690>, which <WG3739> is <WG2076> Christ <WG5547>.

Now <WG1161> this <WG5124> I say <WG3004>: A covenant <WG1242> confirmed beforehand <WG4300> by <WG5259> God <WG2316>, 1519, 5547 the law <WG3551>, which <WG3588> came <WG1096> four hundred <WG5071> and <WG2532> thirty <WG5144> years <WG2094> after <WG3326>, doth not <WG3756> disannul <WG1519>, so as to <WG3588> make <WG2673> the promise <WG1860> of none effect <WG2673>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> the inheritance <WG2817> is of <WG1537> the law <WG3551>, it is no more <WG3765> of <WG1537> promise <WG1860>: but <WG1161> God <WG2316> hath granted <WG5483> it to Abraham <WG11> by <WG1223> promise <WG1860>.

What <WG5101> then <WG3767> is the law <WG3551>? It was added <WG4369> because <WG5484> of transgressions <WG3847>, till891, 3739 the seed <WG4690> should come <WG2064> to whom <WG3739> the promise hath been made <WG1861>; and it was ordained <WG1299> through <WG1223> angels <WG32> by <WG1722> the hand <WG5495> of a mediator <WG3316>.
Now <WG1161> a mediator <WG3316> is <WG2076> not <WG3756> a mediator of one <WG1520>; but <WG1161> God <WG2316> is <WG2076> one <WG1520>.

Is the law <WG3551> then <WG3767> against <WG2596> the promises <WG1860> of God <WG3361>? God forbid <WG1096>: for <WG1063> if <WG1487> there had been <WG1325> a law <WG3551> given <WG1325> which <WG3588> could make <WG1410> alive <WG2227>, verily3689, Leviticus2 righteousness <WG1343> would have been <WG2258> of <WG1537> the law <WG3551>.

But <WG235> the scriptures <WG1124> shut up <WG4788> all <WG3956> things under <WG5259> sin <WG266>, that <WG2443> the promise <WG1860> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102> in Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> might be given <WG1325> to them that <WG3588> believe <WG4100>.

But <WG1161> before <WG4253> faith <WG4102> came <WG2064>, we were kept <WG5432> in ward under <WG5259> the law <WG3551>, shut up <WG4788> unto <WG1519> the faith <WG4102> which <WG3588> should afterwards <WG3195> be revealed <WG601>.
So <WG5620> that the law <WG3551> is become <WG1096> our <WG2257> tutor <WG3807> to bring us unto <WG1519> Christ <WG5547>, that <WG2443> we might be justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102>.
But <WG1161> now that <WG3588> faith <WG4102> is come <WG2064>, we are <WG2070> no longer <WG3765> under <WG5259> a tutor <WG3807>.
For <WG1063> ye are <WG2075> all <WG3956> sons <WG5207> of God <WG2316>, through <WG1223> faith <WG4102>, in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.
For <WG1063> as many <WG3745> of you <WG907> as <WG3745> were baptized <WG907> into <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> did put on <WG1746> Christ <WG5547>.

There can be <WG1762> neither <WG3756> Jew <WG2453> nor <WG3761> Greek <WG1672>, there can be <WG1762> neither <WG3756> bond <WG1401> nor <WG3761> free <WG1658>, there can be <WG1762> no <WG3756> male <WG730> and <WG2532> female <WG2338>; for <WG1063> ye <WG5210> all <WG3956> are <WG2075> one <WG1520> man in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.
And <WG1161> if <WG1487> ye <WG5210> are Christ <WG5547>'s, then <WG686> are ye <WG2075> Abraham <WG11>'s seed <WG4690>, <WG2532> heirs <WG2818> according to <WG2596> promise <WG1860>.
